mapper.select:
SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS DB_OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID AS DB_OBJ_ID, T104.ADM_OBJ_ID AS DB_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS SCHEMA_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS CRET_DT, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS CHG_DT, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS OWNER_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T101.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{pathObjTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = #{pathObjId}
AND (T101.OBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' OR T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%')
AND T101.OBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND (T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID,T101.OBJ_ID) NOT IN ( SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID,OBJ_ID FROM ( SELECT A.OBJ_TYPE_ID , A.OBJ_ID , NVL(C.USER_ID,A.PRIV_RCVR_ID) AS USER_ID FROM PEN_SYS_PRIV_OBJ_R A LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_SYS_GRP_R B ON(A.PRIV_RCVR_ID = B.USER_GRP_ID AND A.PRIV_RCVR_GBN='G') LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R C ON(B.REL_USER_GRP_ID = C.USER_GRP_ID ) ) AUTH WHERE AUTH.USER_ID=#{sessionInfo.userId} )
GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC, T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID, T104.ADM_OBJ_ID ORDER BY T101.OBJ_NM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS TAB_OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID AS TAB_OBJ_ID, T104.OBJ_NM AS TAB_OBJ_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS COL_ORD, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_TYPE, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_LEN, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_SCALE, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS NOT_NULL_YN, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DEFAULT_VAL, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS PK_ORD, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS FK_YN, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 111 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DISTRIB_KEY_ORD FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T101.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{pathObjTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = #{pathObjId} GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC, T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID, T104.OBJ_NM ) T101 ORDER BY TO_CHAR(COL_ORD, '0009')

SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS DB_OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID AS DB_OBJ_ID, T104.ADM_OBJ_ID AS DB_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS SCHEMA_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS CRET_DT, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS CHG_DT, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS OWNER_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T101.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{pathObjTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = #{pathObjId}
AND (T101.OBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' OR T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%')
AND T101.OBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND (T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID,T101.OBJ_ID) NOT IN ( SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID,OBJ_ID FROM ( SELECT A.OBJ_TYPE_ID , A.OBJ_ID , NVL(C.USER_ID,A.PRIV_RCVR_ID) AS USER_ID FROM PEN_SYS_PRIV_OBJ_R A LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_SYS_GRP_R B ON(A.PRIV_RCVR_ID = B.USER_GRP_ID AND A.PRIV_RCVR_GBN='G') LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R C ON(B.REL_USER_GRP_ID = C.USER_GRP_ID ) ) AUTH WHERE AUTH.USER_ID=#{sessionInfo.userId} )
GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC, T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID, T104.ADM_OBJ_ID ORDER BY T101.OBJ_NM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS TAB_OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID AS TAB_OBJ_ID, T104.OBJ_NM AS TAB_OBJ_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS COL_ORD, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_TYPE, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_LEN, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_SCALE, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS NOT_NULL_YN, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS PK_ORD, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS FK_YN, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 111 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DISTRIB_KEY_ORD, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 112 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DID_YN FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T101.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_CD_M T103 ON ( ( T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'DSGN_COMM_INFOTYP' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL ) OR ( T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'DSGN_COMM_CLSTYP' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL ) ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{pathObjTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = #{pathObjId} GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC, T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID, T104.OBJ_NM ) T101 ORDER BY TO_CHAR(COL_ORD, '0009')

SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS DB_OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID AS DB_OBJ_ID, T104.ADM_OBJ_ID AS DB_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS SCHEMA_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS CRET_DT, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS CHG_DT, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS OWNER_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T101.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{pathObjTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = #{pathObjId}
AND (T101.OBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' OR T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%')
AND T101.OBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND (T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID,T101.OBJ_ID) NOT IN ( SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID,OBJ_ID FROM ( SELECT A.OBJ_TYPE_ID , A.OBJ_ID , NVL(C.USER_ID,A.PRIV_RCVR_ID) AS USER_ID FROM PEN_SYS_PRIV_OBJ_R A LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_SYS_GRP_R B ON(A.PRIV_RCVR_ID = B.USER_GRP_ID AND A.PRIV_RCVR_GBN='G') LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R C ON(B.REL_USER_GRP_ID = C.USER_GRP_ID ) ) AUTH WHERE AUTH.USER_ID=#{sessionInfo.userId} )
GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC, T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID, T104.ADM_OBJ_ID ORDER BY T101.OBJ_NM

SELECT T101.LOG_ID , T101.LOG_DT , T101.DB_ID , T102.ADM_OBJ_ID AS DB_NM , T101.LOG_TYPE , CASE WHEN T101.LOG_TYPE = 'INSERT' THEN '등록' WHEN T101.LOG_TYPE = 'UPDATE' THEN '수정' WHEN T101.LOG_TYPE = 'DELETE' THEN '삭제' END AS LOG_TYPE_NM , T101.OBJ_TYPE , CASE WHEN T101.OBJ_TYPE = 'TABLE' THEN '테이블' WHEN T101.OBJ_TYPE = 'TABLE_COLUMN' THEN '테이블 컬럼' WHEN T101.OBJ_TYPE = 'VIEW' THEN '뷰' WHEN T101.OBJ_TYPE = 'VIEW_COLUMN' THEN '뷰 컬럼' WHEN T101.OBJ_TYPE = 'PROCEDURE' THEN '프로시저' END AS OBJ_TYPE_NM , T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T103.OBJ_ABBR_NM , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T104.OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T104.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM , CASE WHEN T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '020101L' THEN '데이터베이스 ['||T104.OBJ_NM||']' WHEN T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '020102L' THEN '테이블 ['||T104.OBJ_NM||']' WHEN T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '020103L' THEN '뷰 ['||T104.OBJ_NM||']' END AS DISP_PATH_OBJ_NM , T101.LOG_TEXT FROM PEN_COLT_DB_L T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T102 ON ( T101.DB_ID = T102.OBJ_ID AND T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '020101L' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T103 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = T103.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID ) WHERE T101.LOG_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDt}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYYMMDD')+0.99999
AND T101.LOG_TYPE = #{logType}
AND T101.OBJ_TYPE = #{objType}
AND (T101.OBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' OR T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%')
AND T101.OBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
ORDER BY T101.LOG_DT DESC
